주문 목록 I

SPELL LIST I

An Mor Fappearing at the end of a spell’s 이름 in the spell lists denotes a spell with a material or focus component, respectively, that is not normally included in a spell component pouch. An Xdenotes a spell with an XP component paid by the caster.

Order of Presentation: In the spell lists and the 주문 설명 that follow them, the 주문 are presented in alphabetical order by 이름 except for those belonging to certain spell chains.

When a spell’s 이름 begins with “하급,” “상급,” or “광역,” the spell 묘사 is alphabetized under the second word of the spell 이름 instead.

히트 다이스: The term “히트 다이스” is used synonymously with “character 레벨” for effects that affect a number of 히트 다이스 of creatures. Creatures with 히트 다이스 only from their race, not from classes, have character 레벨 equal to their 히트 다이스.

시전자 레벨: A spell’s power often depends on 시전자 레벨, which is defined as the caster’s class 레벨 for the 목적 of casting a particular spell. A creature with no classes has a 시전자 레벨 equal to its 히트 다이스 unless otherwise specified. The word “레벨” in the spell lists that follow always refers to 시전자 레벨.

Creatures and Characters: The words “creature” and “character” are used synonymously in the 주문 설명.
